commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
name: dist
on:
  workflow_dispatch:
  push:

jobs:
  build:
    strategy:
      matrix:
        os: [macos-latest, windows-latest, ubuntu-latest]
    runs-on: ${{ matrix.os }}

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 20
          cache: npm

      - run: npm ci

      # .deb builds commonly need dpkg + fakeroot available on the runner
      - name: Install deb deps
        if: matrix.os == 'ubuntu-latest'
        run: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y dpkg fakeroot
        # (These are documented requirements in common deb packaging flows)
        # :contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}

      - name: Build macOS (dmg)
        if: matrix.os == 'macos-latest'
        run: npm run dist:mac

      - name: Build Windows (portable)
        if: matrix.os == 'windows-latest'
        run: npm run dist:win

      - name: Build Linux (deb)
        if: matrix.os == 'ubuntu-latest'
        run: npm run dist:linux

      - uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: dist-${{ matrix.os }}
          path: dist/*
